```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tsne)
```

```{r}
df <- read_delim("glove.840B.300d-char.txt", col_names = F, delim=" ", quote = "—")
df[,1:6]
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
df_reduce <- tsne(df %>% select(X2:X300) %>% data.matrix(), perplexity = 10,
                  initial_dims = 30)

df_reduce <- data.frame(char = df$X1, df_reduce) %>% tbl_df() %>% mutate(char = as.character(char))
df_reduce
```

```{r}
plot <- ggplot(df_reduce, aes(x=X1, y=X2, label=char)) +
          geom_text(family="Source Code Pro Semibold") +
          theme_void(base_family = "Source Sans Pro") +
          labs(title = "Projection of 300D Character Vectors into 2D via t-SNE",
               subtitle = "Characters closer to each other are more similar in usage",
               caption = "Max Woolf — minimaxir.com")

plot
```
